text:
e="preserve">Miss Earth is an annual international beauty pageant promoting environmental awareness.<ref name=chinadaily.com.cn/english/doc/2004-10/25/content_385531.htm>
The reigning titleholders dedicate their year to school tours, tree planting activities, street campaigns, coastal clean ups, speaking engagements, shopping mall tours, media guesting, environmental fair, storytelling programs, eco-fashion shows, and other activities.<ref name=tribuneindia.com/2004/20041008/world.htm>
